subject: Football
lead_paragraph: As if a fumble-plagued loss in overtime to the Cardinals wasn’t bad enough, the Dallas Cowboys will be without quarterback Tony Romo, who broke his right pinkie, for up to a month.
snippet: As if a fumble-plagued loss in overtime to the Cardinals wasn’t bad enough, the Dallas Cowboys will be without quarterback Tony Romo, who broke his right pinkie, for up to a month.
